data.name: Pongsters
data.description:
Step into the immersive world of Pongsters, the multiplayer VR game. As the racket, you'll use your skills to deflect incoming balls and outwit your opponents.

But Pongsters isn't just about winning - it's about the thrill of the competition. With both online and offline play modes, as well as in-game voice chat, you can connect with players from around the world and experience the excitement of multiplayer gaming.

Whether you're a seasoned gamer or a newcomer to VR, Pongsters offers easy-to-learn gameplay that's quick to pick up but hard to put down. And with global rankings and separate leaderboards for solo and multiplayer matches, there's always a new challenge to take on.

So why not join the Pongsters community and see how far you can climb up the rankings? With surprises in store for the top players, there's never been a better time to get in on the action.

FEATURES:
● Multiplayer and offline modes
● In-game voice chat
● Global rankings
● Separate leaderboards for solo and multiplayer matches

Join us and become the ultimate Pongsters champion! If you need any help or want to connect with other players, join our Discord community.
